mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no, u.user_no, b.book_img, b.title, b.book_price, c.product_count, c.product_count * b.book_price AS total_count FROM cart c, users u, book b WHERE c.book_no = b.book_no AND u.user_no = c.user_no AND u.user_no = 1 order by cart_no
SELECT sum(product_count) as total_count, count(*) as col_count FROM cart c, users u, book b WHERE c.book_no = b.book_no AND u.user_no = c.user_no
mapper.update:
UPDATE book b SET b.stock = (select (b.stock - c.product_count) as stock from cart c, users u where c.book_no = b.book_no AND u.user_no = c.user_no)
WHERE exists (select 1 from cart c, users u where c.book_no = b.book_no and u.user_no = c.user_no)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM (select u.user_no, c.cart_no FROM users U, book B, cart C where u.user_no = c.user_no AND c.book_no = b.book_no) WHERE user_no = 1
